name: Earth Attack Force
description:
Earth Attack Force (EAF) is a third person shooter about freeing planet Earth from all human life.

You can expect: Fun shooting and platforming game-play, varied weapons, human enemies, animal friends and much more.

The game is being made by me (https://twitter.com/angelrubio) as a solo developer,  so you can expect the amount of updates a regular puny human (with a job on the side) would be capable of producing, I intend to make this a fun and complete game but can't promise anything, that's why I'll be increasing the price as I add features.
